EmailTemplate.name: 202005_BK_Webinar_SocialFlight_live-event-Joe-Coraggio.Now Available on Demand
EmailTemplate.subject: AVIONICS & AIR RACING – Now available on-demand!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
As promised, here is the recording of the May 26th SocialFlight LIVE episode.
Gregg Cohen President of BendixKing, along with award-winning air race pilot Joe Coraggio discussed trends in general aviation, Joe’s experience with BendixKing avionics and some tips on what it takes to be an air race pilot. We hope you enjoyed the event. WATCH THE RECORDING HERE <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/gtcsazsVxdo4yjgxGNK6Zw]]>
